oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Beardstown, Cass Co., Ill., Jan. 1894
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sanborn-Perris Map Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fire risk assessment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scale ca. 1:600. 50 ft. to 1 in.
